name: Deck of Freyr
description:
Made in Unity during 72 hours for Magara Jam 4, 2022.

Theme: .... is Your Super Ability

and 'Control of H₂O' is your super ability.

[STORY]

Son of Njord... Will you fight with all your might to protect nature or will you lose to the human race who challenged you? Gather all your strength and take your strategies with you, nature needs you. Don't think that you can defeat humanity with just power or strategy alone. Fight with all your might until you are killed and resurrected by Surtr... Remember; to save many places, you may have to sacrifice some places and save your moves for the next round.

[HOW TO PLAY]

[CONTROLS]

[W] [A] [S] [D] or [Mouse] - Freelook for map

[Mouse Click] or [1] [2] [3] - Select Card

[Mouse Wheel] - Zoom in/out

[E] - Next Turn

[R] - Shuffle (Skip this turn and shuffle your deck)
